languages.text: "Лорд-к-капитан, н-непредвиденные обстоятельства на офицерской палубе". {n}Голос Вигдис едва заметно дрожит.{/n} "Многочисленные жертвы, потеря связи... пустотники сообщают о варп-голосах, заполонивших отсеки... но это не варп-прорыв. Это... ваш ксенос, который поднялся на борт на Янусе. Он сошел с ума и устроил резню".

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-к-капитан, н-непредвиденные обстоятельства на офицерской палубе". {n}Голос Вигдис едва заметно дрожит.{/n} "Многочисленные жертвы, потеря связи... пустотники сообщают о варп-голосах, заполонивших отсеки... но это не варп-прорыв. Это... ваш ксенос, который поднялся на борт на Янусе. Он сошел с ума и устроил резню".

languages.text: "Lord Captain, there is an... an emergency at the officers' deck." {n}Vigdis's voice is quaking slightly.{/n} "Numerous victims, loss of communication... The voidsmen report warp-voices filling the compartments... but this is not a warp breach. This is... the xenos you took aboard at Janus. He has gone mad and went on a rampage."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-к-капитан, н-непредвиденные обстоятельства на офицерской палубе". {n}Голос Вигдис едва заметно дрожит.{/n} "Многочисленные жертвы, потеря связи... пустотники сообщают о варп-голосах, заполонивших отсеки... но это не варп-прорыв. Это... ваш ксенос, который поднялся на борт на Янусе. Он сошел с ума и устроил резню".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, there is an emergency at the officer deck." {n}Vigdis's voice is quaking slightly.{/n} "Numerous victims, loss of communication... The voidsmen report warp-voices filling the compartments... but this is not a warp breach. This is... the xenos you took aboard at Janus. He has gone mad and went on a rampage."

The voidsmen report warp-voices filling the compartments... but this is not a warp breach. This is... the xenos you took aboard at Janus. He has gone mad and went on a rampage."

The voidsmen report warp-voices filling the compartments... but this is not a warp breach. This is... the xenos you took aboard at Janus. He has gone mad and went on a rampage."

"Lord Captain, there is an... an emergency at the officers' deck." {n}Vigdis's voice is quaking slightly.{/n} "Numerous victims, loss of communication... The voidsmen report warp-voices filling the compartments... but this is not a warp breach. This is... the xenos you took aboard at Janus. He has gone mad and went on a rampage."

languages.text: “舰长大人，军官甲板上发生了……紧急情况。”{n}维格迪斯的声音有些颤抖。{/n}“出现了无数受害者，连接也被切断了……船员报告说船舱里充满了亚空间的声音……但事故原因并不是亚空间突破了力场，而是……您在加努斯带上船的异形造成的。他发了疯，在船上横冲直撞。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, there is an... an emergency at the officers' deck." {n}Vigdis's voice is quaking slightly.{/n} "Numerous victims, loss of communication... The voidsmen report warp-voices filling the compartments... but this is not a warp breach. This is... the xenos you took aboard at Janus. He has gone mad and went on a rampage."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，军官甲板上发生了……紧急情况。”{n}维格迪斯的声音有些颤抖。{/n}“出现了无数受害者，连接也被切断了……船员报告说船舱里充满了亚空间的声音……但事故原因并不是亚空间突破了力场，而是……您在加努斯带上船的异形造成的。他发了疯，在船上横冲直撞。”

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, il y a... une urgence sur le pont des officiers, {n}annonce Vigdis d'une voix légèrement tremblante.{/n} Nombreuses victimes, interruption des communications... Les cosmomarins font état de cris du Warp qui envahissent les compartiments... mais il n'y a aucune brèche. C'est... le xénos que vous avez embarqué sur Janus. Il est devenu complètement fou. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, there is an... an emergency at the officers' deck." {n}Vigdis's voice is quaking slightly.{/n} "Numerous victims, loss of communication... The voidsmen report warp-voices filling the compartments... but this is not a warp breach. This is... the xenos you took aboard at Janus. He has gone mad and went on a rampage."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, il y a... une urgence sur le pont des officiers, {n}annonce Vigdis d'une voix légèrement tremblante.{/n} Nombreuses victimes, interruption des communications... Les cosmomarins font état de cris du Warp qui envahissent les compartiments... mais il n'y a aucune brèche. C'est... le xénos que vous avez embarqué sur Janus. Il est devenu complètement fou. »

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, ha surgido... una emergencia en la cubierta de oficiales». {n}La voz de Vigdis tiembla ligeramente.{/n} «Hay montones de víctimas, se ha perdido la comunicación... Los infantes del vacío informan de que las voces de la disformidad se escuchan por todos los compartimentos... pero no es porque se haya producido una brecha de la disformidad. Es el xenos que subió a bordo en Janus... Se ha vuelto loco y ha desatado el caos».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, there is an... an emergency at the officers' deck." {n}Vigdis's voice is quaking slightly.{/n} "Numerous victims, loss of communication... The voidsmen report warp-voices filling the compartments... but this is not a warp breach. This is... the xenos you took aboard at Janus. He has gone mad and went on a rampage."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, ha surgido... una emergencia en la cubierta de los oficiales». {n}La voz de Vigdis tiembla ligeramente.{/n} «Hay montones de víctimas, se ha perdido la comunicación... Los infantes del vacío informan de que las voces de la disformidad se escuchan por todos los compartimentos... pero no es porque se haya producido una brecha de la disformidad. Es el xenos que subió a bordo en Janus... Se ha vuelto loco y ha desatado el caos».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、士官デッキで緊急事態です」{n}ヴィグディスの声がわずかに震えている。{/n}「多数の犠牲者、通信不能…。ヴォイズマンによると、歪みの音がコンパートメントに充満していると…しかし、これは<歪み>の障害ではなありません。これは…ヤヌスで乗船した異種族の仕業です。狂って暴れています」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, there is an... an emergency at the officers' deck." {n}Vigdis's voice is quaking slightly.{/n} "Numerous victims, loss of communication... The voidsmen report warp-voices filling the compartments... but this is not a warp breach. This is... the xenos you took aboard at Janus. He has gone mad and went on a rampage."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、士官デッキで緊急事態です」{n}ヴィグディスの声がわずかに震えている。{/n}「多数の犠牲者、通信不能…。ヴォイズマンによると、歪みの音がコンパートメントに充満していると…しかし、これは<歪み>の障害ではなありません。これは…ヤヌスで乗船した異種族の仕業です。狂って暴れています」

languages.text: "Lord Captain, es gibt einen ... Notfall auf dem Offiziersdeck." {n}Vigdis' Stimme zittert leicht.{/n} "Mehrere Opfer, keinerlei Kommunikation mehr ... Die Raumfahrer berichten von Warpstimmen in den Abteilungen ... aber es liegt kein Riss im Warp vor. Sie kommen ... vom Xenos, den Ihr auf Janus mit an Bord genommen habt. Er hat den Verstand verloren und läuft Amok."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, there is an... an emergency at the officers' deck." {n}Vigdis's voice is quaking slightly.{/n} "Numerous victims, loss of communication... The voidsmen report warp-voices filling the compartments... but this is not a warp breach. This is... the xenos you took aboard at Janus. He has gone mad and went on a rampage."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, es gibt einen ... Notfall auf dem Offiziersdeck." {n}Vigdis' Stimme zittert leicht.{/n} "Mehrere Opfer, keinerlei Kommunikation mehr ... Die Raumfahrer berichten von Warpstimmen in den Abteilungen ... aber es liegt kein Riss im Warp vor. Sie kommen ... vom Xenos, den Ihr auf Janus mit an Bord genommen habt. Er hat den Verstand verloren und läuft Amok."

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, subay güvertesinde... Acil bir durum var." {n}Vigdis'in sesi hafiften titriyor.{/n} "Birkaç maktul var, iletişim kesildi... Uçsuz erleri, kompartımanlarda öteboyut sesleri duyuyormuş... Fakat ortada öteboyut yarığı yok. Sadece... Janus'tan aldığınız zeno var. Kudurup katliam yapmış."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, there is an... an emergency at the officers' deck." {n}Vigdis's voice is quaking slightly.{/n} "Numerous victims, loss of communication... The voidsmen report warp-voices filling the compartments... but this is not a warp breach. This is... the xenos you took aboard at Janus. He has gone mad and went on a rampage."
